member.summary: The MSI's ProductCode.

member.summary: A Version object containing the MSI ProductVersion.

member.summary: The URL of the package.

member.summary: The constructor for the Package class.

member.name: T:ACM.Wipt.Transform
member.remarks: A Transform represents an MST file.

member.summary: A Version object containing the version this transform applies to. The build member may be null.

member.name: F:ACM.Wipt.Transform.URL
member.summary: The URL of the transform.

member.name: M:ACM.Wipt.Transform.#ctor
member.summary: The constructor for the Transform class.

member.name: T:ACM.Wipt.Version
member.remarks: The Version object represents a Major.Minor.Build version string.

member.summary: The major version number.

member.name: F:ACM.Wipt.Version.minor
member.summary: The minor version number.

member.name: F:ACM.Wipt.Version.build
member.summary: The build version number.

member.name: M:ACM.Wipt.Version.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: The constructor for the Version class.

member.name: T:ACM.Wipt.Product
member.remarks: The Product class represents an installable product, such as rwho or Wipt.

member.name: F:ACM.Wipt.Product.upgradeCode
member.summary: The product's UpgradeCode.

member.name: F:ACM.Wipt.Product.name
member.summary: The name of the product.

member.name: F:ACM.Wipt.Product.packages
member.summary: A array of packages for this product.

member.name: F:ACM.Wipt.Product.stableVersion
member.summary: A Version object for the product's release version.

member.name: F:ACM.Wipt.Product.develVersion
member.summary: A Version object for the product's development version.

member.name: F:ACM.Wipt.Product.transforms
member.summary: A array of transforms for this product.

member.name: M:ACM.Wipt.Product.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: The constructor for the Product class.

member.name: T:ACM.Wipt.Suite
member.remarks: The Suite class represents a group of products that are independent, but are often installed together.

member.name: F:ACM.Wipt.Suite.name
member.summary: The name of the suite.

member.name: F:ACM.Wipt.Suite.products
member.summary: A array of the names of the products in the suite.

member.name: M:ACM.Wipt.Suite.#ctor(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: The constructor for the Suite class.
member.param: An array of strings for the products member.

member.name: T:ACM.Wipt.WiptException
member.remarks: The WiptException class defines exceptions for Wipt.

member.name: T:ACM.Wipt.Library
member.remarks:
The Library class contains methods to manage the Wipt Library. The Library is analogous to the APT cache, and stores cached package information from repositories.
Methods are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

member.name: M:ACM.Wipt.Library.Load
member.summary: Used internally by the Library to retrieve package database from disk.
member.returns: A boolean value indicating whether the database was loaded from disk.

member.name: M:ACM.Wipt.Library.Save
member.summary: Used internally by the Library to save the package database to disk.
member.returns: A boolean value indicating whether the database was written to disk.

member.name: M:ACM.Wipt.Library.Update
member.summary: The Update method checks for new versions of the package lists for all of the repositories in the sources list.
member.returns: A boolean value indicating if update succeeded for all repositories.
member.exception: Throws a WiptException if bad configuration data is encountered.

member.name: M:ACM.Wipt.Library.Update(System.String)
member.summary: Used internally by the Library to update the package list for a single repository.
member.returns: A boolean value indicating whether the update succeeded.
member.exception: An exception is thrown if two product names match, but the upgrade codes differ.

member.name: M:ACM.Wipt.Library.GetProduct(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieve a Product or suite object from the Library.
member.param: The name of the product or suite (case-insensitive).
member.returns: A Product or Suite object or null if not found.

member.name: M:ACM.Wipt.Library.GetAll
member.summary: Returns all of the products and suites in the Library.
member.returns: An array of Product and Suite objects, or null if an error occurred.
